mapper.select: select * from t_businessman order by create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select id,hotel_sin_name as text from t_businessman where is_active=0
select count(id) from t_businessman where wxopenid=#{openId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_businessman (name, phone, tel, nickname, hotel_sin_name, hotel_name, wxopenid, remark, is_active,type ) values ( #{name}, #{phone}, #{tel}, #{nickname}, #{hotelSinName}, #{hotelName}, #{wxopenid}, #{remark}, #{isActive},#{type} )
mapper.update: update t_businessman set is_active=#{status} where id=#{id}
update t_businessman set type=#{status} where id=#{id}
update t_businessman set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, tel = #{tel}, nickname = #{nickname}, hotel_sin_name = #{hotelSinName}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
